title: my firefox browser in infected.  What do I need to do?
content: My firefox browser in infected with adware, malware,? What do I do to unlock my browser?
creator: lahagan49

title: Firefox search engine keeps using wrong default search
content: I always use google as my default search engine for firefox. I recently got a message saying firefox had been updated. Ever since, whenever I search for something it keeps using yahoo as the default search engine instead of google. I checked the settings and google IS selected as the default search engine. The weird thing is, if I set the default search engine to something like ebay or wikipedia it will use that correctly. It's just that when google is selected it goes to yahoo instead. I appreciate any help, thank you.
creator: chasewalbaum

title: Locked account
content: Mi cuenta hoy salía desconectada del navegador y cuando intenté poner la contraseña me apareció que fue bloqueada por motivos de seguridad. No se me ha notificado por correo y tampoco aparecen alternativas para poder desbloquearla. Tengo mi token de seguridad pero tampoco me funciona. No tengo más dispositivos vinculados a esa cuenta pero necesito recuperarla.
creator: wolfjupiter

title: I think I erased my passwords
content: I had to reinstall my operating system, and thought the Sync with the passkey would allow me to recover my saved passwords and bookmarks. But I put in the key I was given and nothing was recovered. Did I completely misunderstand how the Sync was supposed to work?
creator: quinlantracie

title: Firefox not displaying pdf's properly
content: Whenever I try to open a pdf, the background is all black. (see image)
creator: wdnielsen

title: Firefox won't install on windows 11 23H2 after update.
content: After installing update for Windows 11 23H2, Firefox would run but could not display pages. I tried re-installing Firefox with the online installer but it can't complete the installation and no Firefox.exe can't be found. I then tried downloading and installing the offline version. The installation appears to complete but Firefox doesn't launch and Firefox.Exe can't be found in C:/Program File/Mozilla/.
creator: ko6no

title: can't sign on to yahoo email on firefox pc
content: I can sign on to my att yahoo email on my android phone and on microsoft edge browser on pc, but not on firefox. It acts as if going to connect then says "Logout successful"!
creator: maford

title: Unable to log in to AT&T using Mozilla browser
content:
duplicate of /questions/1489982 thread

I have the latest Mozilla Firefox download after uninstalling the prior version and re-downloading the latest on my windows 10 PC 3 times. I did this after my sign in to AT&T web mail failed to allow me to sign in. I had cleared cookies and cache. I get a window from AT&T saying "somethings gone wrong and try resetting your WiFi" when signing in. I am able to use the Mozilla browser to get to other websites including Yahoo or AT&T. I talked to AT&T and they had me sign into my webmail using MS edge. No problem, and also using MS explorer browser. They said Mozilla browzer was the problem. Anyhelp on solving this will be appreciated.
creator: Bob9754
